sentences.sentence: Before the game everyone gets psyched up and starts shouting.
sentences.translation: 赛前，每个人都嗷嗷大叫着让自己兴奋起来。

sentences.sentence: I'd got myself all psyched up for the interview and then it was called off at the last minute.
sentences.translation: 我为这次面试做好了万全的心理准备，可最后它临时取消了。

sentences.sentence: Many think he is the most psyched climber in the world.
sentences.translation: 许多人认为他是这个世界上最疯狂的攀岩者。
